title: Perak traders have until Oct to comply with vape ban
description: IPOH: The Perak state government has given electronic cigarette or vape traders until October this year to cease their operations, following a decision to ban the sale of these products in the state. Read full story

title: Forget Micro RGB: I saw TCL's new SQD-Mini LED TV, and it's the model to beat at CES
description: The X11L seems almost too good to be true, but I'd love for TCL to prove me wrong.

title: Cinema closes in Lisbon
description: The NOS Alvaláxia cinema, located in the Sporting stadium complex in Lisbon, closed on Thursday, January 1st, the exhibitor's general manager, Nuno Aguiar, told the Lusa news agency.

title: Jessie Buckley wins best actress prize at Critics Choice Awards for performance in Hamnet

title: Crans-Montana bar fire injured a Filipino, says embassy
description: The Philippine Embassy confirmed that one Filipino was injured in a deadly New Year’s Eve bar fire in Switzerland.

title: Educationist Tasks African Countries to Prioritise Youth Empowerment

title: Pakistan, China renew commitment to zero tolerance against terrorism
description: BEIJING : Pakistan and China have once again underscored their uncompromising opposition to terrorism, agreeing to strengthen collaboration in counter-terrorism and security matters while jointly safeguarding the uninterrupted and secure progress of Belt and Road projects under the China-Pakistan partnership. The resolve was restated during the Pakistan-China Strategic Dialogue held in Beijing on January 4, [...]The post Pakistan, China renew commitment to zero tolerance against terrorism appeared first on Daily The Patriot.
